channel.title: All coders please read
channel.description:
[center][b]Hi my name is Matt,
I have a Hamachi server called Tosserscape
I have an item on it.
This item can only be equiped by me.
To get the item i type ::scythe
I want my Friend - Co Owner - User = Rando
To be able to use it to!
But i can't How can i make this possible?[/b][/center]

item.title: All coders please read
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[code][quote author=adamhelloman8 link=topic=348672.msg2681733#msg2681733 date=1235424145]
Having hamachi doesn’t affect coding at all.

Find the command in client.java

If it says something like && playerRights >= 3

Make his player rights 3 in his character file.

no dont do that either
if you do that his rights will be owner which he isnt
so leave his rights at 2 and go in client.java and
search for this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("scythe")

then youll see this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("scythe") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourusername")) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rando") should look like that when your finished[/code]

then do search for this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419

then make it look like this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourusernamehere")) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rando") // unequips weapon if your name isn't yourusenamehere or rando -

Read full topic

item.title: All coders please read
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Having hamachi doesn’t affect coding at all.

Find the command in client.java

If it says something like && playerRights >= 3

Make his player rights 3 in his character file.
